snippet: In November China will stop its long-held practice of using the organs of executed prisoners for transplant operations, a senior official said Thursday.
abstract: China will start phasing out its long-held practice of using organs of executed prisoners for transplant operations in November, as it pushes to mandate the use of organs from ethical sources in hospitals
lead_paragraph: In November China will stop its long-held practice of using the organs of executed prisoners for transplant operations, a senior official said Thursday.

headline.main: China: Organ Transplant Program Will Phase Out Executed Inmates
headline.print_headline: China: Organ Transplant Program Will Phase Out Executed Inmates
